short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn purchases from your favorite online merchants into donations to your nonprofit, school, or association -- at no cost to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The We-Care Reminder makes it easy to support your favorite nonprofit every time you shop online. When you visit a participating merchant, you'll see a message thanking you for supporting your cause. You simply shop as you normally do, and a donation will be made — at no cost to you.

It’s this easy:

1. Install the We-Care Reminder.
2. Visit http://www.we-care.com/CauseSearch to choose the cause you want to support.
3. When you visit a participating merchant, you’ll see a message thanking you for supporting your cause. If you make a purchase, a donation will be made — without taking a penny from your pocket.
